definitions.definition: A sandwich, usually with a hot savoury filling in a breadcake. The most common are chips, bacon, sausage and egg.
A miner who works under contract, receiving a fixed amount per ton of coal or ore.
(among boys) A drudge; a cat's paw; someone who does the hard work; someone who is being taken advantage of by someone else.
definitions.example: Ah didn't play butty, ah promise yer. Yo all on yer mek the poor lad yer butty.

definitions.definition: One of a pair of shoes or gloves.
definitions.example: I've fund one shoe, but canna see the butty no-weer.

definitions.definition: To work together; to keep company with.
To cohabit; to reside with another as a couple.
definitions.example: Did'n'ee 'ear as Jim Tunkiss brought three children to the parish? I reckon 'e inna married, but 'e's bin buttyin' along o' one o' them Monsells.

definitions.definition: To act in concert with intent to defraud; to play unfairly.

definitions.example: Shall it be a giggy thing, or a carty thing, or a butty thing?
